subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Patrick Reed, wearing red and black, held off Bubba Watson and Jamie Donaldson to finish at four under and win by one shot at the World Golf Championships event in Doral, Fla.
snippet: Patrick Reed, wearing red and black, held off Bubba Watson and Jamie Donaldson to finish at four under and win by one shot at the World Golf Championships event in Doral, Fla.
